thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com
thread.title: Mike

author: Mike
title: Mike
text: As the title says I took a risk to purchase these glasses. I received them very quickly through FedEx. The only problem is that the glasses could be fake, but I can't tell. The shipment was sent from China and not Italy. The glasses did past the initial inspection for quality but we'll see how long they last. I'd buy a pair from them again, based on this experience.
